author: guitargeek
body:
This is a retake on https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/23473, which has caused problems in some tests (see https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/23692 and https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/23693).

* Implemented Fall17 Electron MVA ID V2.
* Restructured Electron and Photon MVA ID such that input variables are automatically obtained given their name in the XML weight file.
* MVA ID categorization and cuts now specified in python config file.
* Added Electron ntuplizer to train/validate MVA implementation
* Added Photon ntuplizer to validate Photon MVA implementation.

It is relevant for @Sam-Harper, @lsoffi, @michelif, sorry for the spam guys...

So these workflows failed last time (https://cms-sw.github.io/relvalLogDetail.html#slc6_amd64_gcc630;CMSSW_10_2_X_2018-06-26-1100):

1. 136.7722 RunJetHT2016H_nano
2. 1325.7 TTbar_13_94Xv2NanoAODINPUT
3. 1325.9 TTbar_13_92XNanoAODINPUT
4. 1329.1 ZEE_13_80XNanoAODINPUT
5. 134.707 RunSingleEl2015B
6. 136.844 RunCharmonium2017B
7. 10001.0 SingleElectronPt10
8. 10003.0 SingleElectronPt1000

I was not able to test all of them myself due to DAS errors, but I could run number 1. 2. 4. and 5.

About the external requirement:

* This PR needs exactly the same files as the previous one which I committed here: https://github.com/cms-data/RecoEgamma-ElectronIdentification/pull/9
* Then there is this corresponding cmsdist PR: https://github.com/cms-sw/cmsdist/pull/4056
* Which got reverted: https://github.com/cms-sw/cmsdist/pull/4157
title: Electron MVA V2 and General Restructuring of Egamma IDs - Once again
